name: expo-ecommerce-shop
description: A full-stack eCommerce mobile app built with Expo & React Native, powered by a Node.js + Express backend and MongoDB. Features user authentication with Clerk, payments via Stripe, state management with TanStack Query, Tailwind styling, and error monitoring with Sentry. Deployed on Sevalla.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix admin && npm run build --prefix admin
